title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Super Bowl Bubble + Ian O’Connor on Jeter Legacy, Brady Tampering, Giants/Jimmy G Fit
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Super Bowl Bubble + Ian O’Connor on Jeter Legacy, Brady Tampering, Giants/Jimmy G Fit
description:
First, (3:00) Colin lists his ‘Super Bowl Bubble’ teams that are good enough to bring home a Lombardi, and which teams are sitting outside looking in. He also explains how the Rams plan on managing Matt Stafford’s tennis elbow, and if they should keep OBJ for another year.

Then, Ian O'Connor -- NY Post columnist and author of Coach K: The Rise and Reign of Mike Krzyzewski Belichick, and The Captain -- and Colin discuss the new Derek Jeter doc The Captain (12:00), the contrast between the careers of A-Rod and Jeter (14:00), how George Steinbrenner influenced the dynasty (21:00), if the Yankees will regret paying Aaron Judge (24:00), if the Mets are a World Series team (28:00), if the Giants could sign Jimmy G if they stumble early (33:00), how the PGA’s ineptitude helped create the rise of LIV Golf (40:00), and if Tom Brady should be catching more heat for discussing Dolphins ownership in his final Pats season (46:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
